attributes.review: i downloaded this wonderful (or so i thought) app to support our amazing future ✨🍊orange 🍊✨however, this app took 5 weeks to download and when it finally did i got a notification saying our beloved donald was confiscating my phone after he hacked it and changed my language settings to chinese😿the change was irreversible, and he took my phone. i am typing from my ipad😾
attributes.title: awful😔✋🏻

attributes.review: First thing first this app is horrible 1/10 would not recommend to anyone...and if you support trum you sick balls and also gen z rocks let’s eat the rich and you know create a system that helps poc in the country ✨🧚🏾✨🦋💋
attributes.title: Girl hell nawl👁👄👁

attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever seen in my life. It brings down other people just so the orange can feel better about himself and there is no point to this app. So I’m listing saying you should not get this app.😊
attributes.title: Yo

attributes.review: this app took 2years to download and when it did my brother went missing and my car wouldn’t start any more. i also found that every mirror in my house had been shattered to bits and my chandelier almost killed me. i was hopeful at first but this app has done nothing positive at all and has kept none of its promises. i expected so much more and my life is now completely ruined.
attributes.title: ✨💕🧚🏼worst app ever 💕✨🧚🏼

attributes.review: i opened the app and was appalled, they shove a racists orange orangutan in your face and expect me to think it’s a decent being.  i’m very disappointed in the state of our government, it’d be so much better if you just STOP BEING RACIST🙈😬😌💅🏽
attributes.title: black lives matter

attributes.review: worst app i’ve downloaded. I wanted to see trumps plans for the 2020 election and I lost braincells reading. this app should not even exist and is doing more harm then good. I will be taking my business else where
